about.title: About Me
about.description: I've been working in software development for 5 years, mainly with .NET, and I feel most at home on the backend. That said, I'm also comfortable with frontend development, primarily using React. I enjoy learning new things, so I occasionally dive into mobile development (React Native) and desktop apps (Electron, MAUI) as well. I'm always looking for ways to improve myself.

We've known each other for a long time, but this was our first time working together, and he did an absolutely professional job. He quickly understood what was needed and remained flexible throughout the task.
